title: TO_BOOLEAN
description: Converts a string into a Boolean value. If the input cannot be converted, the function returns an error.

parameters.name: string
parameters.description: The string to convert into a Boolean.

examples:
IF(TO_BOOLEAN(Opt_In__c), "Subscribed", "Not Subscribed")
-- Converts the text value in the field 'Opt_In__c' into a Boolean
-- If 'Opt_In__c' equals "true" (ignoring case), the formula returns "Subscribed". Otherwise, it returns "Not Subscribed".

tips.text: The function returns TRUE if the input string, ignoring case, equals "true".
Any string that does not match "true" (case insensitive) returns FALSE.
